nodes.text: Xaf Awards were a prize given to certain individuals. Horticultural educator Kaat Thrick-Thrick won three times for sponsoring the Find Your Equilibrium contest at the Perpendicular Universe Fair.

The Xaf Awards were mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
